title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the two things that are holding back the Cowboys after their loss to the Cardinals at home. He discusses the Rams come from behind win over the Ravens and why we don’t have to overreact to another Matthew Stafford pick-six. He also tells you why he was right about Chargers QB Justin Herbert and wrong about the Philadelphia Eagles. Plus, Super Bowl champion Trent Dilfer joins the show to break down the play of Joe Burrow and what makes the young QB special in today's NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
